metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2400 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
External Control of File Name or Path in GitHub repository dompdf/dompdf prior to 2.0.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: civicrm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
icingaweb2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
php-dompdf package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3ubuntu0.20.04.1').
